Title: The Angels Take Manhattan
Plot: The Doctor?s heart-breaking farewell to Amy and Rory ? a race against time through the streets of Manhattan, as New York?s statues come to life around them? With Rory?s life in danger, the Doctor and Amy must locate him before it?s too late! Luckily, an old friend helps them and guides the way.
